document.full_text: a man suspected of being the "holiday bandit" after bank robberies this winter in new york and new jersey was arrested in queens on tuesday, the fbi announced.
document.title: suspected "holiday bandit" bank robber arrested in queens
lines_and_colors: a man suspected of being the "holiday bandit" after bank robberies this winter in new york and new jersey was arrested in queens on tuesday, the fbi announced.
